title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

title.en: Being a Maid Is Better Than Being a Princess

altTitles.en: A Maid Was More of a Calling Than a Princess
It's Better to Be a Maid Than to Be a Princess

altTitles.es: Mi vocación era ser doncella, no princesa
Ser sirvienta es mejor que una princesa torturada

altTitles.vi: Trở Thành Hầu Nữ Còn Quan Trọng Hơn Là Làm Công Chúa

altTitles.zh: 比起公主，侍女才是我的天职

description.en:
Siana was a princess of a small kingdom. Until the imperial army attacked…

Just before her neck was about to be cut by the cruel prince, Siana screamed, “Please spare me!”

Towards the prince with blood staining his beautiful face, Siana pleaded with a desperate voice.

“I have many skills learned in the palace. Wouldn’t I be useful as a maid?”

And so, Siana became a probationary maid of the palace. But surprisingly, the job suited her temperament?! When she swept the floors, the corridors became clean, when she kneaded dough, sweet cookies were baked, when she did laundry, the bedding became white and fragrant! She only did her best as a maid, but gradually, the royal family began to warm up to Siana.

“The tea you brewed is always the best.”

“The dress you made? Truly beautiful.”

“I want you to educate the prince.”

But she never thought of capturing this man’s heart…

“I feel the same.”

“…”

“I can’t live without you, Siana,” hearing the tender voice of the prince, Siana tightly closed her eyes.

Look, Your Highness. I just want to live as an ordinary maid!

title.en: I Can See the Forbidden Zone Rules

description.en: Two hundred years ago, the White Mist Forbidden Land suddenly appeared, and the world underwent a huge change. Monsters and supernatural beings with various strange powers appeared. The White Mist Forbidden Land is known as the Forbidden Zone for Life. Only one in ten thousand people who enter it survives. After being imprisoned by the mysterious wall for seven years, Ye Shiqi, who was tired of life, finally stepped into the White Mist Forbidden Land again. With the reappearance of blindness, a set of information suddenly appeared in front of Ye Shiqi’s eyes: That is the forbidden zone rules that have troubled mankind for many years!

title.en: All My Abilities Are Forbidden Spells

altTitles.zh-ro: Quanmin Zhuan Zhi Wode Jineng Quan Shi Jin Zhou Qianyue

altTitles.zh: 全民转职：我的技能全是禁咒 签约

altTitles.en: Job Transfer For All: My Skills Are All Forbidden Spells

description.en:
Lin Han finds himself transmigrated into a world that merges reality and games. This world is rife with dungeons, forbidden zones, and hidden realms, not to mention rampaging monsters! 

When the time for the Class Change comes, Lin Han doesn’t receive the Warrior Class that he has always dreamt of. 

Instead, he receives the class Life Cleric. Just as he’s despairing over his misfortune…

[Ding! You’ve awakened the “Myriad Augmentation System”!] 

With every attribute augmented ten thousand times, all of Lin Han’s basic skills have turned into Forbidden Spells! 

Watch Lin Han as he dominates the battlefield with his Forbidden Spells and becomes known as a close-combat Healer!
- - -
Crossing to the other world with his soul, Lin Han arrived in an era where games and reality merged. There are countless dungeons, forbidden lands, and hidden realms where mighty monsters reign supreme!

On the day of his class profession, Lin Han missed the opportunity to become a warrior, the class of his dreams! Unexpectedly, he awakened the unique hidden profession – Life Sacrificer – at a critical moment!

[Ding! Ten Thousandfold Amplification System Awakening!]

Lin Han’s attributes increased by ten thousand times, and his basic skills all reached forbidden curses!

In the name of a close-combat healer, during the moment of unlimited forbidden curse devastation!

This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.

altTitles.ja: デカいはちの話

description.en: What if bees were big and fluffy? Like, really big and fluffy.

altTitles.ja: 踏んだり、蹴ったり、愛したり

altTitles.zh: 打是亲骂是爱、爱得不够用脚踹

description.en: Kaho is busy working hard every day and is exhausted both mentally and physically. Her only recourse is drinking with the handsome Akira, who indulges in drinking, smoking, fighting, and having fun with women. She truly thought they were able to become quite good friends without any romantic feelings between them - until that night...
description.ja:
毎日激務の仕事に追われ、心身共に疲労する日々を送るOL・佳帆（かほ）には、唯一の楽しみがあった。
それは、お気に入りのバーで知り合ったイケメン・泰（あきら）と気兼ねなく楽しく飲むこと。
酒、煙草、喧嘩、女遊びetc…付き合ったらアウトな条件満載の泰だが、
お互いに恋愛感情もなく、良き友人として関係を築けていると思っていた。
あの夜までは──。

甘いマスクの三十路クズ男×バリバリ働くアラサーOLの、
大人のバグった距離感ラブ（？）コメディ！

title.en: I Scared the Divine Lord as I Handed over the Ancient Immortal Pill

altTitles.zh-ro: Kaiju Shang Jiao Taigu Xian Yao, Wo Xia Huai Sheng Zhu

altTitles.zh: 开局上交太古仙药，我吓坏圣主

altTitles.id: Aku menakuti sang dewa agung dengan menyerahkan ramuan surgawi kuno

description.en: Bai Yifan has an ancient ring that allows him to travel freely between the Earth and the fantasy world, and he has discovered that "plants and animals" on the Earth will evolve into treasures when they are taken to the fantasy world. An apple evolves into an immortal fruit, an egg will hatch into a phoenix or an earth dog has the bloodline of a dragon. One could even use tobacco to manipulate the enemy to their advantage.
description.id: Bai Yifan memiliki cincin kuno yang memungkinkannya untuk melakukan perjalanan dengan bebas antara Bumi dan dunia fantasi, dan dia telah menemukan fakta bahwa "tanaman dan hewan" di Bumi akan berevolusi menjadi harta karun ketika dibawa ke dunia fantasi. Sebuah apel berevolusi menjadi buah abadi, sebuah telur akan menetas menjadi burung phoenix atau seekor serigala bumi yang memiliki garis keturunan naga. Mereka bahkan dapat menggunakan tembakau untuk memanipulasi musuhnya.

title.en: Gods of All People: I Sacrificed Hundreds of Millions of Living Beings To Become a God

altTitles.zh: 全民神祇：我献祭亿万生灵成神

altTitles.en: Spirit Sacrifice: The Path to Godhood
Everyone Is a King: I Sacrifice Countless Lives to Become a King

description.en:
Han Wu transmigrated to a world where everyone can become a god. He obtained the ability to sacrifice life.
At the beginning, he had a trash clan, so he sacrificed to change his fate against the heavens.
With no power, no status, and no money, he sacrificed his way to the top.
As long as he has enough followers, he can become infinitely stronger through sacrifice, becoming the main god, the god of gods!

altTitles.ja: 殺彼―サツカレ―

description.en: Yūta Kiryū is an abusive man who raises his hands to women. One day when they're on a date, Yūta shows violence toward his girlfriend as usual, but unexpectedly, life is turned around in an instant. His girlfriend dies and while fleeing the scene, he encounters a group of serial murderers. He finds himself repelled by their "values" but is nonetheless pulled into their world. The manga features an array of criminal types including men who commit domestic violence, a murderer-rapist, a cannibal, and a necrophiliac. Who do you want to be killed?

title.en: Margrave’s Bastard Son was The Emperor

description.en:
He became the Emperor when he was just a boy and was beheaded before reaching adulthood. It was a tragedy brought about by his fate as the first noble wizard.

“Ian, don’t be born in your next life.”

He thought everything was over, listening to the traitor’s heartless words. He knew, but…

“You are a symbol of peace. Where else would you find such honor as a lowly one?”

He became the Margrave’s bastard son, whose family went extinct 100 years ago.
A lowly, unsophisticated one, destined to be sold as a hostage to the barbarians across the border.

altTitles.ja: 終の退魔師―エンダーガイスター

altTitles.th: มือปราบปิศาจคนสุดท้าย ENDER GEISTER

altTitles.vi: Chung Chi Thối Ma Sư -Ender Geister-

description.en:
Akira, a demonically strong S-class exorcist, is sent from Germany to investigate a paranormal event in a certain city in Japan. 
He destroys creatures from other worlds with his beautiful exorcist partner Chikage.
description.es: Akira es un exorcista de clase S que es enviado desde Alemania para investigar un incidente sobrenatural en cierta ciudad de Japón. Él y su compañera, la hermoso exorcista Chikage, acabarán a las criaturas que han venido de otro mundo.
description.id: Akira adalah pengusir setan kelas S yang dikirim dari Jerman untuk menyelidiki insiden supernatural di kota tertentu di Jepang. Dia dan rekannya, pengusir setan cantik Chikage, akan menghabisi makhluk yang datang dari dunia lain.

altTitles.ja: 犬がヒトになる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Inu ga Hito ni Naru Hanashi

altTitles.zh-hk: 我家碰太變成了人類這件事

altTitles.ja: ポン太がヒトになりまして。

description.en:
A slapstick comedy that involves a town and its neighbors where “pet dogs” have become “humans”!
Feelings that couldn’t be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly…!?
description.fr: Un jour, les chiens de cette ville sont soudainement devenus humains. L'histoire suit la vie de Saki et de son chien Ponta.
description.ru: В один прекрасный день домашние собаки в этом городе вдруг превращаются в людей. История рассказывает о жизни хозяйки Саки и ее собаки Понты.
description.uk: Одного разу всі собаки, які жили в цьому місті раптово перетворилися на людей. Історія розповідає про життя Сакі, власниці, та Понти, її пса.

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

title.en: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse

altTitles.ja: 黙示録の四騎士

altTitles.tr: Yedi Ölümcül Günah: Mahşerin Dört Şövalyesi

description.en: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!
description.es:
La profecía se ha cumplido. "En un futuro no muy lejano, habrá cuatro caballeros sagrados que destruirán el mundo. Son los Cuatro Jinetes del Apocalipsis.""
Los santos caballeros que juraron fidelidad al rey Arturo estaban ansiosos por cortar el mal de raíz. Las consecuencias de estos acontecimientos llegan hasta la frontera... y sacuden el destino de un niño. Un niño que da el primer paso como le dice su corazón. ¿Qué le espera: sueños, esperanzas, gloria o pecado? La fantasía heroica del pasado y del presente, ¡el inicio!
description.fr: Percival vit seul avec son grand-père Bargis, au sommet d’une haute montagne nommée le “Doigt divin”. Il y mène une vie heureuse, préservé du monde extérieur. Mais le jour de ses 16 ans, son destin bascule : un mystérieux guerrier à l’armure rouge s’en prend violemment à lui et à son grand-père. En effet, ce Chevalier sacré de Camelot est chargé d’éliminer quiconque s’apparenterait aux “Four Knights of the Apocalypse”, un groupe de cavaliers qui, d’après la prophétie, apparaîtra pour renverser le roi Arthur… Laissé pour mort, Percival survit à ses blessures et décide de partir en quête de vengeance, et d’aventures !
description.ja:
『七つの大罪』正統続編！ 全世界待望の冒険ファンタジー!!

予言は示された。「遠くない未来、世界を滅ぼす四人の聖騎士が現れる。――その名を〈黙示録の四騎士〉」。厄災の芽を摘まんと色めき立つは、アーサー王に忠誠を誓いし一騎当千の聖騎士たち。その余波は、遠く辺境にまで及び……、一人の少年の運命を揺るがす！ 己が心の命ずるまま、一歩を踏み出す少年。その前途に待つは、夢か希望か栄光か罪か。古今無双のヒロイック・ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.pt: A profecia indicava que num futuro não muito distante, aparecerão quatro cavaleiros sagrados que destruirão o mundo: São os Quatro Cavaleiros do Apocalipse. Os quatro cavaleiros sagrados, que juraram fidelidade ao Rei Artur, estão muito animados para cortar esta calamidade pela raiz. As consequências chegam até à fronteira e abalam o destino de um rapaz, ......! Um rapaz dá um passo em frente como manda o seu coração. O que o espera é um sonho, uma esperança, glória ou pecado. Começa uma fantasia heróica dos mundos antigo e moderno!
description.tr: Nazik bir çocuk olan Percival, büyükbabasıyla birlikte "Tanrı'nın Parmağı" adlı uzak bir yerde yaşıyor. Ancak dünya onun barış içinde yaşamasına izin vermeyecektir. Gizemli bir şövalyeyle karşılaşmaları kaderlerini değiştirir ve şok edici bir sır ortaya çıkar. Çocuk sonsuz bir yolculuğa çıkar. "Yedi Ölümcül Günah"ı bilseniz de bilmeseniz de tadını çıkarabilirsiniz! Dünyanın en çok beklenen macera fantezisi!
description.uk: Історія є продовженням манги "Сім Смертних гріхів". Початок манги знайомить нас з Персівалем - шістнадцятирічний хлопець з ширяючого острова «Палець бога», який після певних подій вирушає в подорож чарівним королівством під назвою Британія.
description.es-la: Percival, un niño bondadoso, vive con su abuelo en un lugar remoto llamado "El dedo de Dios". Sin embargo, el mundo no le permite vivir en paz. Un encuentro con un misterioso caballero cambia su destino, y se revela un impactante secreto. El niño emprende un viaje interminable. Tanto si conoce "Los siete pecados capitales" como si no, ¡podrá disfrutar de él! ¡La fantasía de aventuras más esperada del mundo!
description.pt-br: Percival, um menino bem-humorado, vive com seu avô num lugar remoto chamado “O Dedo de Deus”. No entanto, o mundo não permite que ele viva em paz. Um encontro com um misterioso cavaleiro muda seu destino, e um segredo chocante é revelado. O menino embarca numa jornada sem fim.

altTitles.th: ขบวนการกำมะลอ

altTitles.ja: 戦隊大失格

description.en:
Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10000 meters in the sky to invade Earth!

The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety!

The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest…?

From Haruba Negi, the creator of *5Toubun no Hanayome*, comes the action-packed superhero series of a lifetime!
description.es: ¡Hace trece años, el Ejército Villano del mal apareció de repente en su gigantesco castillo flotante a 10.000 metros en el cielo para invadir la Tierra! El ejército villano tiene capacidades de revivir que los hacen inmortales, lo que los convierte en una seria amenaza para la humanidad. Para protegernos de estos invasores, los Rangers Dragón Divino, los Guardianes del Dragón, empuñan sus poderes milagrosos y sus armas, las Herramientas Divinas, ¡y luchan continuamente por nuestra seguridad! ¡El asalto del Ejército Villano! ¡La vigilancia de los Guardianes del Dragón! ¿Tendrán éxito en su conquista? ¡Descúbrelo en la serie de superhéroes llena de acción de toda la vida!
description.fr:
Il y a 13 ans, un château flottant est apparu à 1000 mètres au-dessus du sol et une armée maléfique est venue dans le but d'envahir l'humanité.
Afin de protéger l'humanité contre ces envahisseurs, des super-héros se battent, mais les choses ne semblent pas être comme elles le paraissent !
description.ru: Тринадцать лет назад армия монстров таинственным образом объявилась на территории людей, паря в воздухе на своем летучем замке! Армия монстров обладает различными способностями, которые могут грозить человеческой безопасности. Дабы защитить мирных жителей от вторжения на землю, доблестные герои - Хранители Дракона в составе из пяти человек выходят на поле правосудия! Используя свой туз в рукаве под названием «артефакт», боевой отряд героев из года в год, каждое воскресенье усмиряет неугомонных монстров. Однако, спустя 999 поражений, один из членов команды монстров решает отомстить героям!.. С этого момента и разворачивается наша история борьбы добра со злом!
description.pt-br: Há treze anos, de repente, o Infame Exército do mal apareceu em seu gigantesco castelo flutuante 10.000 metros no céu para invadir a Terra! O exército vilão tinha capacidades de reviver, o que os tornava imortais, tornando-os uma séria ameaça para a humanidade. Para nos proteger contra esses invasores, os Divine Dragon Rangers, os Dragon Keepers, manejam seus poderes milagrosos e suas armas, Ferramentas Divinas, e lutam continuamente por nossa segurança! O ataque do Exército Vilão! A vigilância dos Dragon Keepers! Eles terão sucesso em sua conquista...?

title.en: Doro no Bunzai de Watashi dake no Taisetsu wo Ubaouda Nante

altTitles.ja: 泥の分際で私だけの大切を奪おうだなんて

altTitles.en: Being Low as Dirt, Taking What's Important From Me

description.en:
The very famous song by the popular music unit TUYU has been comicalized!
Protect the girl who is destined to die an untimely death.
That is the mission given to me and my senpai from the heavenly realm. How is it a job ...... to come down to earth and protect stupid human beings?
Moreover, protecting an ordinary girl......?
Why do we, beautiful angels, have to do such a thing!
[Senpai] must have been thinking that way all along. I believed that, but why that kind of--?
description.ja:
大人気音楽ユニット・ツユの超名曲がコミカライズ！
「非業の死を遂げる運命の少女を守れ」
それが、天界から私と【先輩】に与えられた使命。地上に降り、愚かな人間なんてものを守るのが仕事なんて……。
しかも、普通の少女を守る……？
なんで美しき天使である私たちがそんなことをしなくちゃいけないの！？
【先輩】もずっとそう考えているに違いない。そう信じていたのに、なんであんな――。

description.en:
'Can you buff me?'

Monaka, who looks like a top-tier experienced player at a glance, offers to form a party with White Jack, who's a returning player of “Lunatic Online”, but…

'Don't step on that.'

'Ack!' 

'Take a potion.' 

'Hack! Haack!' 

'I'm sorry… I couldn't click on the potion.'

Get to know the noob, White Jack, Monaka's character, and the other guild members.

'We're getting married, so change genders, Hyung. You lost earlier at rock-paper-scissors.'

The chaotic life of Lunatic's Netkama*!

(This game is set in the virtual game “Lunatic”, which is based on the online game “La Tale”.)

(Please be aware: Due to the nature of this series, this work purposely uses incorrect spellings for a sense of realism.)

*TL/N: Scarecrow can also mean 'puppet/figurehead'.
*Netkama is a term for when a male uses a female character online and hides their true identity. The original author, Kimma, also wrote the novel, “Netkama Punch!!!”.

altTitles.es-la: El Dios de la Batalla de la Academia de Cazadores

description.en:
With an F-rank Trait, deemed the worst of the worst, 5-year-old Shin Yu-sung is abandoned by the Shin-oh family, which is famous for raising hunters.

The same year, he meets one of the strongest hunters, the Fist King, at the orphanage and is adopted by him. The Fist King became the strongest not through his Trait or special abilities — but by training his body.

He takes note of Shin Yu-sung's physique instead of his Trait — nine blocked yin pathways.

“Your blocked pathways cause your body’s mana to overflow, giving you an exceptional mind and god-like looks! But you also pass away before coming of age…”

An abundance of bodily yang.

“Your body is overflowing with the energy that can cure your nine blocked yin pathways!”

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

Su, born in prison, has always wanted to see the "crow" from what her mother told her. On the day when she was about to be secretly executed, Gill, the artificial intelligence, was thrown into prison for a test run. She compasses everything from the outside world in her database. Su developed special feelings for Gill, although she didn't care that the words Gill spoke were programmed or from her own consciousness. Unable to distinguish her own human feelings... in this small cell, the lonely Su got her first doll--she met a "person" who could bring her solace.

altTitles.ja: 閃光マック+パトロールX

description.en:
After 40 years, two heroes have arrived in the present day!!
Ilmine Daiji, the all-powerful sci-fi hero "Senkou Mac" and
'Patrol X' is now in book form for the first time!!

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

altTitles.ja: ファヴェーラの漫画家

description.en:
Comic artist Takei Hiroto, who was rejected once again at a serialization meeting, decided to give up on his dream and go on a heartbroken trip to Brazil to get over everything.

In a favela (slum) he accidentally wandered into, Hiroto meets a poor boy with sharp eyes named João. Living on the exact opposite side of the Earth, João surprisingly has a dream of becoming a mangaka (Japanese comic artist)…!!

No matter who you are or where you live, you don’t have to give up. The story of two slums comic artists chasing their dreams begins!!

title.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.ja: 君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女

altTitles.es-la: Las 100 Novias Que Te Quieren Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho

altTitles.ru: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят

altTitles.zh-hk: 超超超超超喜歡你的100個女友

altTitles.pt-br: As 100 Namoradas que te Amam Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Mesmo.

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no koto ga daidaidaidaidai suki na 100-nin no Kanojo

altTitles.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

description.en:
Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. 

Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

altTitles.ja: 気になってる人が男じゃなかった

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

description.en: The past life died because of the imperial concubine, and he was born again in the high school era. It coincides with the recovery of the aura and the great changes in the world. When rejuvenating a teenager, he will follow the path of his journey, and he will protect his own friends. Loved ones. When he does not choose to stay, he will push him all the way.

title.en: I Became the Mother of the Bloody Male Lead

altTitles.en: I Became the Bloodthirsty Male Lead's Mother
I Became the Mother of a Bloody Male Lead
I Became the Mother of the Tragic Male Lead

description.en:
When I opened my eyes, I became Sheriel, the mother of the male protagonist in the novel, A Wasteland Without Blood or Tears. In the original novel, the male lead, Cardicel, was famous for being cruel, so I looked at him with trepidation, thinking he would be different from the beginning, but what was this? My son, who will soon become the lead male protagonist, is so cute.

“We can’t let such a cute child grow up to be a person who imprisons and harms the female lead!”

title.en: Cute Baby Arrives: Mommy is Super Fierce

altTitles.zh: 萌宝驾临：爹地妈咪超凶的

altTitles.en: Adorable Baby Arrives: Daddy and Mommy Are Super Fierce
Cute Baby Is Coming: Daddy and Mommy Are Super Fierce

altTitles.zh-hk: Meng Bao Jia Lin: Die Di Ma Mi Chao Xiong De

altTitles.en: The Adorable Treasure Has Arrived: Daddy and Mommy Are Super Fierce

description.en: When the not-so-famous actress Jane wakes up in the morning, her cute-but-nagging son Ian already had her day plan out for her – go on a blind date and find a father for the household. However, her date turns out to be Mark Quinn, the biological father of her son. The sullen business man obviously doesn't have the best impression of Jane and would not have expected that they will enter marriage soon with the help of Mark's father and Ian...

title.en: Cutie's Here: Mommy, Where's My Daddy?

altTitles.zh: 萌宝来袭：妈咪我爹地呢？

altTitles.zh-ro: Meng Bao Laixi: Mommy Wo Daddy Ne?

description.en:
The female lead, Ye Xiange, used to be a trainee within Linshan Entertainment. Before she could officially debut however, she was plagued by scandals and her nudes were all over the media. The company terminated the contract with her and she was also cheated by her boyfriend. What she didn’t expect most was that she suddenly had a five year old son after waking up. What the hell? Child, who’s your mommy? And who’s your daddy?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [WebComics](https://webcomicsapp.com/comic/Mommy-where-s-my-daddy-/5fc48c108c252b53063303eb)

altTitles.ja: アウトサイダー パラダイス

description.en: From the author of Asobi Asobase comes a new comedy series, about… the Art Club from Asobi Asobase.

altTitles.ja: サイコメトリー〜能力持ちの弁護士〜

description.en:
The genius lawyer Noh HyungJin’s justice-executing returner fantasy!

Valedictorian of his University, perfect score on the Bar Exam, and even a 95% case win rate. Noh HyungJin was a so-called successful lawyer. While he was fighting against evil, higher powers to make South Korea a just and fair land, he was ruthlessly murdered by National Intelligence Service agents.

“He shouldn’t have died…”

Noh HyungJin was a man sent by Emperor YeomRa to fix corruption on Earth! However, after ending up in hell without having been able to achieve anything, Emperor YeomRa returns Noh HyungJin back in time.

“I should at least give him power so he can protect himself.” What is this ‘power’ given to him by Emperor YeomRa? Will Noh HyungJin be able to change his future as well as the future of South Korea?!

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74662)
description.ja:
勝率95.8%の弁護士は不利な訴訟を引き受け、国家情報院に殺されてしまうが次に目を覚ますと中学２年生に戻っていた。法律の知識と新たに手にしたサイコメトリー能力で様々な問題を解決し未来を変えるべく、彼は最年少弁護士になる道を歩み始める…。

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74662)
description.ko:
천재 변호사 노형진의 정의구현 회귀 판타지! 

대학교 수석에 사법고시 수석, 95% 달하는 승률까지 속칭 잘나가는(?) 변호사였던 노형진! 그는 정의로운 대한민국을 만들기 위해 커다란 권력에 맞서 싸우던 중 국정원 요원에 의해 무참히 살해당하고 만다. 

"죽어서는 안 될 놈인데…" 

노형진은 사실 옥황상제가 지상의 타락을 바로잡기 위해 보냈던 인물이었다! 그런 그가 허무하게 저승으로 돌아오자 옥황상제는 다시 한번 노형진을 지상으로 내려보내게 되는데… 

"자기 목숨 줄을 지킬 정도의 힘은 줘야지." 옥황상제가 말한 그 '힘'의 정체는 과연? 과연 노형진은 자신의 미래와 대한민국의 미래까지 모두 바꿀 수 있을 것인가?!

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74662)
description.ru:
Фантастика о возвращении гениального адвоката! Но Хёнджин был выпускником университета с отличием по адвокатуре, и так называемым успешным адвокатом с 95% выигрышам по делам! В борьбе со злом в лице высшей власти Южной Корее, пытаясь вернуть справедливость в свою страну, он был безжалостно убит агентами национального агентства разведки.

“Он не должен был умирать…” Но Хёнджин был возвращен императором Ёмра, чтобы очистить коррупцию на Земле, вернув его назад во времени и дав некую силу. Что же за силу ему даровал император? Сможет ли Но Хёнджин изменить как своё будущее, так и всей Южной Кореи?!

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74662)
description.pt-br: A retorno de fantasia de execução da justiça do advogado gênio Noh HyungJin! Primeiro lugar de sua universidade, nota máxima na OAB e até uma taxa de 95% de ganho de casos. Noh HyungJin é o tão chamado advogado de sucesso! Enquanto estava lutando contra o mal e poderes maiores para tentar tornar a coreia do sul uma terra justa, ele foi assassinado sem piedade pela Agência de Inteligência Nacional. “Ele não devia ter morrido…” Noh HyungJin foi um homem enviado pelo Imperador YeomRa para acabar com a corrupção na Terra! Mas, depois de acabar no inferno sem conseguir conquistar nada, o Imperador YeomRa retorna Noh HyungJin no tempo… “Devo pelo menor dar poder suficiente para que ele possa se proteger.” O que é esse ‘poder’ que foi dado para ele pelo Imperador YeomRa? Noh HyungJin conseguirá mudar o futuro dele assim como o da Coreia do Sul?!

title.en: Fake It to Break It! I Faked Amnesia to Break off My Engagement and Now He's All Lovey-Dovey?!

altTitles.ja: 婚約破棄を狙って記憶喪失のフリをしたら、素っ気ない態度だった婚約者が「記憶を失う前の君は、俺にベタ惚れだった」という、とんでもない嘘をつき始めた

altTitles.ja-ro: Konyaku Haki wo Neratte Kioku Soushitsu no Furi wo Shitara, Sokkenai Taido datta Konyakusha ga "Kioku wo Ushinau Mae no Kimi wa, Ore ni Betabore datta" to Iu, Tondemonai Uso wo Tsuki Hajimeta

altTitles.en: When I Faked Amnesia to Break off My Engagement, My Fiancé Casually Told Me a Ridiculous Lie - "You Were in Love With Me Before You Lost Your Memory"

description.en:
Viola, the daughter of a viscount, wanted to break her engagement with Philip, a duke, because it would only bring her disadvantages. So, in the wake of an accident, she decided to fake amnesia.

However, Viola was suddenly overwhelmed by Philip when he uttered incomprehensible lies such as:

“You and I were in love with each other.”

“When we were alone, you used to call me Phil.”

While pretending to have amnesia, she ended up caught in strange circumstances.

---

**Links:**
[Official English Translation (Comikey)](https://comikey.com/comics/fake-it-to-break-it-faked-amnesia-to-break-up-manga/692/)

title.en: Act Like a Boss Monster, Mr. Swallow!

altTitles.ru: Ведите себя как подобает боссу подземелья, господин Сваллоу!

altTitles.en: The Unbeatable Dungeon's Lazy Boss Monster
Mr Devourer, Please Act Like a Final Boss

altTitles.es-la: Actúe como un jefecito final, Sr. devorador

description.en:
The Primordial Core’s an unconquerable dungeon, the lair of the most powerful monster ever to exist, the Original Monster, the incarnation of evil — Swallow... who happens to be a lazy boss monster who just wants to sleep.

Taking care of this lazy bum is Renee, a homunculus maid whose obsession with Swallow knows no bounds. At this point, the only one keeping the dungeon running is Patrick, the last brain cell of the bunch — and he’s a skeleton!

Will Mr. Swallow get any rest amid all this chaos?

The battle for the scholarship raged like wildfire. At the entrance of the school director’s office, Lin Yujing and Shen Wan came face to face.

After exhausting their tears, the two people stared at each other blankly for three seconds before turning around in unison and leaving.

Shen Wan got onto his private helicopter while Lin Yujing climbed into her Rolls-Royce.

–This is a story of two rich people trying their best to look poor in front of the other.
description.fr: Lorsque les parents de Lin Yu Jing divorcent, elle décide de suivre son père dans une nouvelle ville avec sa belle-mère et son demi-frère. Transférée dans un nouveau lycée, elle se fait très vite de nouveaux amis, dont son voisin de table, le redoublant Shen Juan.

altTitles.ja: チュートリアルが死ぬほど難しい

description.en:
Lee Hojae had given up his life as a pro gamer, until one day he received a mysterious message: “Congratulations! You’ve been invited to the Tutorial World.” Intrigued, he enters the game and confidently chooses “hell” difficulty, but soon learns that he is trapped there. With a mere 0.01% survival rate, Hojae must somehow overcome the game’s agonizing challenges to figure out the real reason he was invited. This tutorial may be tough, but its secrets are what’s truly hellacious.

---

description.ja:
元プロゲーマーの堂山海は、ある日突然「チュートリアル」という名の異空間に招待された。 軽い気持ちで最凶クラスの難易度「ヘル」を選択してしまった彼は、離脱不可能、生存率ほぼゼロの「死にゲー」に挑むことになってしまった。 殺伐としたこの世界で生き残るために課せられたミッションをクリアしながら、チュートリアルに秘められた秘密を解き明かしていく。

gandara 퓨전 판타지 장편소설 '튜토리얼이 너무 어렵다' 가 웹툰으로 독자 여러분을 찾아갑니다.

삶이 무료하던 어느 날, 내 눈앞에 나타난 초대 메세지. 
[튜토리얼 세계에 입장하시겠습니까?] 

그리고 뒤이어 나타난 난이도 선택 창. 
[이지] [노말] [하드] [헬] 나는 주저없이 헬 난이도를 선택했다. 

그리고 후회했다. 

아무리 헬 난이도라지만, 이건 너무 심하잖아.

Однажды, посреди серых скучных будней, перед глазами появляется уведомление. [Вы хотите пройти обучение?]

За ним сразу же вылезло окно выбора сложности. [Лёгкая] [Обычная] [Сложная] [Адская]. Я без колебаний выбрал адскую сложность.

И пожалел.
Знаю, она называется адской, но это слишком.

altTitles.ja: おぼろとまち

description.en: From Miyagi to the bustling life of a Tokyo high school, Machi Nishina wanted anything but the ordinary. Her wish is granted in the most unexpected way when she encounters Oboro Kasumi, a classmate harboring a secret, who ends up following her home...?! A new era of friendship and youthful comedy unfolds!

altTitles.ja: お面を付ける

description.en:
"Do not take your mask off, this is not your world."  
"Once this flower withers, you will be able to go back."  
  
This is the yokai festival where you mustn't take off your mask.  
  
Three tangentially related short stories that can be read independent of each other.

title.en: Demon King of the Royal Class

altTitles.en: The Demon Prince Goes to the Academy

altTitles.es-la: El Principe Demonio va a la Academia

altTitles.ja: 魔王様は学園に行く

description.en:
Upon dying, the author of "The Demon King is Dead" is given two choices: go to hell or be reborn in his novel and survive till the end.

The problem? He's reborn as Baalier Junior, a weak demon prince, after his realm was conquered! To make things worse, his attempt to escape somehow gets him enrolled as a student of the Royal Class in Gradias Temple, a prestigious human school.

In the midst of plotlines and political schemes, can this author keep his identity a secret and reach a happy ending?

altTitles.ja: くじ引き特賞：無双ハーレム権

description.en:
I drew a lottery at the Shopping District and won the privilege to go to another world. After drawing a lot of balls, unexpectedly I got a cheat-like skill. Silencing those who are noisy and getting hold of all the things that I want. I will satisfy all my desires.  


---
description.pt:
Um virgem que ganha na loteria e como prêmio pode ir para outro mundo e escolher seu poder.  


---

  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Bookwalker)](https://bookwalker.jp/de3a938b85-e9d2-4f4d-9161-49b2f44782a3/)
description.pt-br:
Ganhei na loteria do Shopping District o privilégio de ir para outro mundo.  

Depois de sortear várias bolas, inesperadamente ganhei uma habilidade semelhante a uma trapaça. Com esse poder, satisfarei todos os meus desejos e terei o meu próprio harem!

altTitles.ja: カウンタック

description.en: The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun recieves a letter… from himself? The letter was from Shun 25 years ago for his future self. The letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

altTitles.th: รักบ๊องๆ ของยัยจอมป่วน

altTitles.ja: おバカちゃん、恋語りき

description.en: Since childhood, Neiro has been known for being good at fighting, making people fear her and giving her the title of Kansai's strongest woman. Wanting to find romance, she decides to transfer to a high school in Kanto. Instead, what faced her was a specially assembled class of delinquents.

altTitles.en: Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan
The Youngest Son of a Renowned Family of Swordsmen
Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan

altTitles.es-la: El hijo menor del maestro de la espada

description.en:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UspJjUOFrFQ)
description.ko:
진 룬칸델
대륙 최고의 검술명가, 룬칸델의 막내아들
룬칸델 역사상 최악의 둔재

비참하게 쫓겨나 허무한 최후를 맞이한 그에게
다시 한 번 기회가 주어졌다.

“너는 이 힘을 어떻게 사용하고 싶더냐?”
“저를 위해 사용하고 싶습니다.”

전생의 기억과 압도적인 재능, 그리고 신과의 계약

최강이 될 준비는 끝났다.

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UspJjUOFrFQ)

altTitles.ja: 蓮禄昕～宿命の華～

altTitles.es-la: La heroína oculta de su Majestad

description.en:
Yeon Lokheun is a girl who grows up living as a boy learning martial and spiritual arts. She heads for the palace in order to clear the name of her father, a wanted criminal, where she meets the young Emperor Garyun. He promises to save her father's life in exchange for her lifelong services. After gaining Garyun's trust, she travels the world solving supernatural-like problems that arise in place of the Emperor. But how long can she continue this life without the others finding out that she is actually a woman?

---
Lokheun’s name means "happy morning," but her life takes a tragic turn when her mother is murdered and her father becomes a fugitive after exacting revenge. To save him, Lokheun devotes her life to Garyun, the dashing emperor who’s committed to right the wrongs of his father. Believing Lokheun to be a boy, Garyun is determined to mold her into an unsurpassed martial artist, even if it means sending her to hell. Their strained relationship turns into something more as Lokheun searches for the one thing she’s never had: a life befitting her name.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%B0%EB%A1%9D%ED%9D%94/2621), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=51793959)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/his-majestys-secret-heroine/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/76054)
description.es-la: Yeon Lokheun es una niña que crece viviendo como un niño aprendiendo artes marciales y espirituales. Se dirige al palacio para limpiar el nombre de su padre, un criminal buscado, donde conoce al joven emperador Garyun. Él promete salvar la vida de su padre a cambio de sus servicios de por vida. Después de ganarse la confianza de Garyun, viaja por el mundo resolviendo problemas sobrenaturales que surgen en lugar del Emperador. ¿Pero cuánto tiempo puede continuar esta vida sin que los demás descubran que en realidad es una mujer?

title.en: Sensei! Bokutachi ga Sekai wo Horoboshimasu.

altTitles.ja: 先生！ 僕たちが世界を滅ぼします。

altTitles.en: Teacher, we will destroy the world!
The strongest Assassin as a Teacher

description.en:
A "Teacher" has a sacred job that protects and guides students.

In this world where people who can use magic and people who cannot use magic coexist, Solo is a sorcerer who lives alone.
He is also known as No. 0, a skilled assassin who always completes any request he receives.

"As part of a certain mission, I am assigned to teach at a magic school, and the teenagers I am assigned to teach are the students of the Class 2D, which is made up of dropouts."

While he is desperately playing the role of a teacher in order to complete his mission, a transfer student arrives and the situation takes an unexpected turn...

A school fantasy unfolding between a false teacher and the strongest assassin and the most evil students who serve as his "beacon"!
description.ja:
『教師』とは、生徒を守り、教え導く聖なる仕事。
魔法が使える人間と使えない人間が混在するこの世界で、孤独に生きる一人の魔導士・ソロ。
受けた依頼は必ず完遂するという凄腕の殺し屋・No.0（ナンバーゼロ）という異名も持つ彼は、
とある任務の一件で魔法学校で教師をすることになりますが、そこで担任することになったのは、学年の落ちこぼれが集まる２年Ｄ組。
任務遂行のために必死に教師を演じている最中、そこに転校生がやってきて事態は思わぬ方向に…。
偽りの教師で最強の暗殺者と、彼の“標”となる最凶の生徒たちが繰り広げる学園ファンタジー！

description.en:
‘One day, I became a ‘Storage Character’ within a game!’

A no-life gamer with seven max-level characters is stuck within the highest-difficulty Virtual Reality game, .

Unfortunately for him, he just had to get stuck when he was on his level 10 ‘Storage Character’.

It might be a shabby start to his new life, but at least he can take comfort in his abundance of items, right?

altTitles.ja: 神殺しの模倣使い

description.en:
"If it’s to protect someone close to me… then I’d even kill a god."

Half a century ago, Dungeons, Monsters, as well as people who had received special abilities commonly referred to as [Skills] appeared. Those people were referred to as Adventurers and challenged dungeons in search of dreams and riches.

Kisaragi Tsukasa is one of these adventurers. However, he has received an inferior skill and was often treated as trash. One day, he was tricked by his peers and was thrown into a dangerous dungeon.

What awaited him at the other end was the Mythical monster, the God-Eater Fenrir. In despair over the overwhelming power difference, Tsukasa was prepared to die. That was when the master of the dungeon, Loki, appeared before him.

“Welcome to my castle.”

Thanks to Loki, Tsukasa’s skill evolved to become [Copycat]... A unique boy-meets-girl story woven into a modern battle fantasy is about to begin!

altTitles.es: NIGROMANTE DE LA ESTACIÓN DE SEÚL

description.en:
[You have entered the dungeon at Gwachun Station’s 1st Exit.]

After years of fighting for survival on planet Alphen, Kang Woojin had become a fearsome necromancer and ruler of his own territory. But now that he’s finally found a way back to Earth, he’s nothing more than a low-level player clearing dungeons for cash. Soon enough, though, Woojin’s undeniable skills have major guilds vying for his attention. And just in time, because with Woojin’s old enemy threatening invasion, those skills might be the only thing standing between humanity and destruction!
description.ko: 20년 전. 알 수 없는 이유로 아르펜 행성으로 소환된 '강우진'. 미약한 그는 잔학한 몬스터들 틈에서 살아남았고, 마침내 '만렙의 네크로맨서'로 성장했다. 그의 등장으로 아르펜의 모든 살아있는 존재들은 공포에 떨었고, 죽은 자들은 그에게 경배했다. 분수를 모르고 그에게 칼을 겨눈 자들은 싸늘한 주검이 되어 그 피로 대지를 적셨다. 그리고 아르펜으로 소환된 지 20년째 되던 날, 그토록 돌아가고 싶었던 지구로 향하는 포탈이 열린다! 그런데.. [과천역 1번 출구 던전에 입장하셨습니다.] "뭐지? 어째서 지하철역에서 몬스터가..? 왜 또 시간은 5년밖에 안 지난 거야?" 의문이 채 해결되기도 전에 서서히 지구를 옥죄어 오는 거대한 적. 트라넷과 그의 수하들. "이 X끼들. 아주 뒤지려고 여길 쳐들어와?" 절체절명의 지구, '만렙의 네크로맨서'의 분노가 세상을 구한다!
description.ru:
[Вы вошли в подземелье через первый вход на станции Квачхон]
Бывший ученик средней школы Кан У Джин обнаруживает, что после насильного призыва на чужую планету на 20 лет, он возвращается на Землю, которая уже отличается от родного дома из его воспоминаний.

Наблюдайте за становлением Кан У Джина, сильнейшего Некроманта Земли!

altTitles.ja: あかね噺

description.en: Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical entertainment. Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane will take her own steps into this unique world!
description.fr:
Shinta s'est perfectionné 13 ans durant afin d'atteindre le statut de Shin'uchi, le plus haut rang des rakugo-ka. Mais malgré sa très bonne performance lors de l'examen de passage, le juge de l'épreuve, l'émérite Maître Arakawa Issho, a décidé de renvoyer de l'école Arakawa l'ensemble des participants sans donner davantage d'explication ! Ainsi s'arrêta nette la carrière de Shinta, qui avait tant sacrifié pour accomplir son rêve…
Mais Akane, la fille de Shinta qui admirait son père et son rakugo plus que tout, ne compte pas en rester là !
description.th:
ที่สุดแห่งศิลปะการเล่าเรื่องที่ใช้ผู้แสดงเพียงหนึ่งคนและเรื่องเล่าเพียงหนึ่งเรื่อง --- "ราคุโกะ" นักราคุโกะ อาราคาวะ ชินตะและอาคาเนะลูกสาวของเขาต่างก็หลงเสน่ห์ของความบันเทิงอันสุดแสนจะเรียบง่ายนี้ ในวันที่ชินตะขึ้นเวทีแสดงในการสอบเลื่อนชั้นเป็นชินอุจิ อาคาเนะเองก็ได้ชมการแสดงนั้นอยู่และเส้นทางของนักราคุโกะที่อาคาเนะตัดสินใจก้าวเดินไปก็คือ---- มังงะราคุโกะขนานแท้ที่เหล่านักราคุโกะล้วนมาประชันฝีมือฟาดฟันกันได้เปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br: Rakugo - a forma perfeita de contar histórias, na qual tudo na história é expresso apenas com seu corpo e palavras. Shinta e sua filha, Akane, foram seduzidos por essa maravilhosa forma clássica de entretenimento. Observando seu pai treinar para passar no teste de Shin’uchi, Akane avança neste mundo único.

title.en: A Boy Who Was Just a Friend for Ten Years Confessed Love to Me

altTitles.ja: 10年間友達だと思ってた男の子に告白されるお話

altTitles.ja-ro: 10-Nenkan Tomodachida to Omotteta Otokonoko ni Kokuhaku sareru Ohanashi
Juunenkan Tomodachi da to Omotteta Otokonoko ni Kokuhaku sareru Ohanashi

description.en:
The Beginning of... Love!? Straightforward and pure high school love!

Rintarou, the boy who've been friends with since we were small. Large, grim and popular. He turned down a girl again... What a waste!

"No, because I love you."

...Huh? What!? That's the first time I've heard about this!!! W-w-w-why me-

Damn...!!!
I can't believe he would confess to me. I feel like I lost and it's frustrating. Now that it's come to this, I'll test him and see if he's good enough to be my boyfriend!!

A straightforward and pure high school love, begins!!

(Translation of the Amazon description for the first volume by KasketBox)
